name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 415 Morning Wood-Fired Cooking
description:
This NFT represents Proof 415 from MaMeeFarm™, recorded on the final day of 2025
under the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework.

The record documents the act of starting a wood-fired stove in the early morning
to cook rice for daily living at the farm. This activity reflects subsistence
labor, energy self-reliance, and continuity of life without external support
systems.

The fire was built using collected firewood, and the cooking process began
before sunrise, emphasizing routine, discipline, and real-world dependency
between human labor, fuel, and food.

Observed details:
- Activity: Wood-fired stove preparation and rice cooking
- Time recorded: 06:43 AM
- Date: 2025-12-31
- Energy source: Firewood (manual ignition)

This proof forms part of a continuous, non-retroactive evidence chain that
captures real-life work exactly as it occurs, verifiable through cryptographic
processes defined by DGCP.

Location: MaMeeFarm™, Thailand
System: DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof)

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
